title: How to find a song that I heard on an ad - Quora

response.answer_text: I know that there’s an app that will identify a song that is played into the phone. Lol, as I could be a winning contestant on the show “Name That Tune”, there is a strong possibility that, I could sing the entire song (excluding rap, or modern day pop sung by girls that I could be grandmother to). When it comes to the Beatles, I can sing the song, then start the next song, as it was on the album! It’s like breathing in and out. And, they are my oxygen.
Google the advert, usually works, some one else will probably know it. or ask on qoura, but give details of ad dates etc
